en.is_not_valid_origin_for: is not a valid derivation origin for
en.waiting_for_auth_data: Hang tight, we are connecting you
en.validating_auth_data: Hang tight, we are validating the dapp's information
en.finalizing_auth: Hang tight, we are starting your session
en.no_auth_data: It looks like you were sent here for authentication, but no service requested authentication.
en.auth_failed: Something went wrong during authentication. Authenticating service was notified and you may close this page.
en.auth_success: Authentication successful. You may close this page.
en.create_to_continue_to: Create an Internet Identity to connect to
en.auth_same_identity: and you will be authenticated to both with the same identity.
